arts.ttl: Former Lille and Everton winger joins goal shy Union St Gilloise as striker coach
arts.sum: HLN are reporting that former Everton winger Kevin Mirallas has joined Union St Gilloise as striker coach. The former Belgian international was Sporting Director for a short period with Eendrachtâ€¦

arts.ttl: Kane scores double as Bayern beat Union Berlin
arts.sum: Harry Kane scores twice and set up another as Bayern Munich secure a comfortable Bundesliga victory over Union Berlin.
